author: Shure Australia
title: Suddenly working from home? Here's how to make sure your message still gets across
description: Shure’s Mobile Recording Kit provides A-grade audio so you can stay connected with clients and colleagues, no matter where you're located.
content: Theres an age-old tale in the Australian Outback: you might be able to pick-up two-and-a-half TV channels and even then, only sometimes but so long as you can clearly hear whats happening, you can put up with a surprisingly bad picture. Thats a lesson thats r… [+6202 chars]
